document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Carabus ( Carabus ) sculpturatus
Ménétriés, 1832
= gilanicus Mandl, 1967
Citations: Ala-Dagh, Bojnurd, 30 km North of Ghuchan (Prov. of Khorasan; Deuve, 1993 ).

Carabus ( Mimocarabus ) maurus calosomoides Reitter, 1896
= demetrii
Semenov, 1903
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Damavand, Gosfand Sara, 2008 (Prov. of Tahran); Tavir, and Firooz Kola 2010 (Prov. Mazandaran).

Carabus ( Mimocarabus ) maurus paphius L. Redtenfoacher, 1843 Citations
: Farsistan region (prov. of Fars ; Redtenfoacher, 1850 ).
Citations: Without exact locality (Bousquet et al. , 2003 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Deuve
bibRefCitation.refString: Deuve, T. (1991) Nouveaux Cychrus et Carabus d'Asie. Bulletin de la Societe des Sciences Naturelles de l'Ouest de la France, 70, 17 - 21.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Carabus ( Limnocarabus ) clathratus stygius Ganglbauer, 1890 Citations
: Without exact locality (Bousquet et al. , 2003 ).

Carabus ( Tomocarabus ) rumelicus kurdistanicus Eidam, 1931
= kurdistanicola Deuve 1990
Citations: Without exact locality (Bousquet et al. , 2003 ).

paragraph.taxonomicName: Carabus ( Pachystus ) tamsi persicola Deuve & Wrase, 2013

bibRefCitation.author: Deuve
bibRefCitation.refString: Deuve, T. (2008) Nouveaux Carabus L., 1758 de Chine et d'Iran. Coleopteres, 14 (22), 257 - 264.

= ingratus
Lapouge, 1907

astrabadensis
Semenov, 1903

subSubSection.paragraph:
Carabus ( Megodontus ) persianus persianus
Roeschke, 1896
= damashensis
Deuve, 2006
Citations: 25km South east of Nur, Lavidzh (Prov. of Mazandaran; Deuve, 2001 ).

Carabus ( Megodontus ) stroganowi luisae
Rapuzzi, 2005
Citations
: Province Gilan (
Rapuzzi, 2005
).
= heinrichi Mandl, 1966
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Kolijak, 2012 (Prov. of Mazandaran).

Carabus ( Megodontus ) stroganowi pseudopersianus Deuve, 2001 Citations
: Rudbar env. (Prov. of Gilan; Deuve, 2001 ).

Carabus ( Megodontus ) stroganowi stroganowi
Zoubkoff, 1837
= galugahensis
Lassalle, 2001

Carabus ( Megodontus ) stroganowi transfuga Semenov, 1898
= transcurrens Csiki, 1927
Citations: North of Iran , Talesh Mt.s (Prov. of Gilan; Semenov, 1898 ).

Carabus ( Procerus ) scabrosus elbursianus Mandl, 1958 Citations
: Elburz Mts. R, Tacht-e Suleiman, Sardab-Tal "Hasankif", 10-1400 m (Prov. of Mazandaran; Mandl, 1958 ).

cylindricior Deuve, 1994

Carabus ( Lamprostus ) guycolasianus colorescens Deuve, 2001 Citations
: Elburz Mts. R (Deuve, 2001 ).

Carabus ( Lamprostus ) guycolasianus guycolasianus Deuve, 2001 Citations
: 100 km South of Chalus, 2300 m (Prov. of Mazandaran; Deuve, 2001 ); Rostamabad (Prov. of Gilan; Deuve, 2001 ).

Citations: Hero-Abad Mt, Charasu Dagh, 2000-2300 m (Prov. of East Azarbaijan; Deuve, 2001 ); Asbhoni village, 2000 m ; Talych, Elburz Mts. R; Astara, 1900 m (Prov. of Gilan; Deuve, 2001 ); Ardabil (Prov. of Ardabil; Deuve, 2001 ); West of Ahar, 1400 m ; Saqqez (Prov. of East Azarbaijan; Deuve, 2001 ).
